author: gradha
msg: Book Spanish. Added term to glossary.

author: maxb
msg: mailer.py: Add Win32 compatibility (hopefully - I cannot test)
This commit removes the duping external diff programs' stdout to the output
file descriptor of mailer.py in certain circumstances, in favour of a simple
read-write loop, simplifying the code and providing easy Win32 compatibility.
* tools/hook-scripts/mailer/mailer.py: Add a minimal Popen3 compatibility shim
for platforms without the real thing.
(SMTPOutput.run): Remove, deferring to base class implementation.
(PipeOutput.__init__): Remove member null, used only by removed run method.
